title: Are we just going to pretend MF is fine now???
body: Because shes still trash and shes still getting overshadowed by every other ADC in the game, except maybe ez.

replies.body:
One change would make her viable 

give her w her passive move speed for the entire duration and she will be fine
I wouldve made it so E applies impure shots every .5 seconds or so.
Riot said they're looking at some Changes for her (was in red post collection on surrenderat20.com) so soon they'll probably be looking at doing something, maybe buffs or reworking her kit design.

The problem is she is Niche, she has to be picked into an AoE wombo combo or she is basically worthless, she still has a decent laning phase and all that, she just gets overshadowed because of a massive reliance on people being stupid enough to stay on her ult.

Put her into a comp with Orianna/Wukong/Gnar/J4/Azir etc. and you will find she actually does really well, she just kinda requires that in the first place which makes her seem underwhelming.
I honestly have never seen an MF ult do anything more than tickle enemies.
You've never seen a 5 man team stuck in the middle of an MF ult then.
She is my 2nd most played and mastery level 5 champion. I stopped playing her when they got rid of grieving wounds from her W. I find her really useless now because of it. Thanks rito...

i dunno why riot dont wanna put in the effort for a bigger rework. this buff probably means that they wont touch her for a while. i guess we're gonna be playing with her niche being "adc with a ms boost, a large range damage ult and a nice sxc hourglass figure" its weird that this was the only non-bugfix champion change in the 5.19. its almost as if they didnt wanna change too much just so people wouldnt be like "omfg worlds doesnt have the most current up to date patch wtf rito mf is gonna be useless there why didnt you include it in 5.18 hurrdurr"

As Miss Fortune being my 5th most played champion, and with my 1 and only penta kill on MF, I honestly feel she is a decent ADC! Obviously not as good as some meta picks, but maybe the meta may shift in the pre-season. She's still a great bot lane champion that can really chunk towers and do insane DPS.
